protein.general_function: Involved in choline transmembrane transporter activity
protein.specific_function: Isoform 1, but not isoform 3, exhibits some choline transporter activity.

go_class.description: positive regulation of I-kappaB kinase/NF-kappaB cascade

reference.reference_text: O'Regan S, Traiffort E, Ruat M, Cha N, Compaore D, Meunier FM: An electric lobe suppressor for a yeast choline transport mutation belongs to a new family of transporter-like proteins. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2000 Feb 15;97(4):1835-40.
